text: God kamaghɨn ifonge, ia Krais Iesusɨn akam baraghtɨ, an ghuzim ia rueghtɨ ia Godɨn damazimɨn zuegham. Egha fomɨra God Afeziam ia gɨfo, egha ia mɨsevezɨ ia an gumazamizibar otifi. Godɨn Duam ia gamizɨma ia an gumazamizibar otifi, tuavir kamɨn a ia mɨsefe. Ezɨ God bar ian apangkuvigha egha ia gamima ia navir amɨrizimɨn iti.
